title: MD
biography: Konda Subbarama Das, popularly known as K. S. R. Das, was an Indian film director and editor known for his work in Telugu and Kannada cinema. Active primarily in the 1970s and 1980s, Das was known for his action films and made significant contributions to South Indian cinema.
aiSummary: S. K. Das is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 128 at Stroke & neurodegeneration (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
